cards.description: Horizen is the zero-knowledge-enabled network of blockchains. Horizen offers best-in-class tools for developers to custom-build private or public blockchains with flexibility unmatched by others.
As investing pioneers in the blockchain space, the team sponsors, supports and incubates exciting early stage blockchain projects through careful analysis and research.
Leveraging the best qualities of existing networks in a high-speed transaction layer, Ferrum Network presents an alternative method for validating and expediting activity between users.
Starter Capital help projects recreate the future by providing access to technical resources, marketing assistance, and starting capital.
Specializing in the blitz Launch of crypto startups. Their strengths lie in brand building, narrative marketing and the ability to attract the best specialists to take up tactical roles.
Premium marketing services to boost projects Conducting in-depth research markets, identifying business and user personas, elaborate strategies and development.
Empire Global provides end-to-end blockchain development, blockchain consulting, and tokenomics services to multiple business domains in cryptocurrency.
